overview:
Philip Macartney is Irish head of sales of Bebo. Prior to Bebo, Macartney was Senior Agency Sales Executive at Dublin radio station FM104. During his appointment, he dealt with the major Irish advertising agencies as well as key clients such as Fas, XtraVision, EBS and McDonalds directly and was responsible for achieving sales of over â‚¬6m annually. He also developed a digital sales solution for the FM104 group of websites.

Prior to joining FM104 Macartney was a founder member of internet kiosk operator Every1online.
